trackerSettings.title: {trackerName} settings
trackerSettings.text: Override the global tracker settings for this tracker. This may be buggy and is not recommended for normal use.

fps.title: FPS transfer rate
fps.tooltip: Select the FPS transfer rate for the trackers. If using Bluetooth, 50FPS may be more stable.

sensorMode.title: Sensor mode
sensorMode.tooltip: Select the sensor mode for the trackers. Mode 1 enables the magnetometer which is best if you have a stable geomagnetic environment (mag status is green or yellow). If unstable (mag status is red), use mode 2.

sensorCorrection.title: Sensor auto correction
sensorCorrection.tooltip: Enable or disable sensor auto correction features. Usually not needed to be changed and results vary between environments.

debugging.title: Debugging
debugging.tooltip: Some debugging options for this individual tracker.

settings.title: Global settings
settings.text: Change the global settings for the program and the trackers. Highly recommended to use HaritoraConfigurator for tracker settings instead as this may be unreliable.
settings.tooltip: Set the global settings for the trackers or the program. An option with yellow text requires a restart of the program to fully apply.

connectionMode.title: Connection mode
connectionMode.tooltip: Select the connection mode for the trackers. Multiple modes can be selected at once.

comPorts.title: COM ports
comPorts.tooltip: Select the COM ports your GX(6/2) dongles are using. Up to 4 ports can be selected (3 for GX6 and 1 for GX2) unless checks are bypassed.

fps.title: FPS transfer rate
fps.tooltip: Select the FPS transfer rate for the trackers. If using Bluetooth, 50FPS may be more stable.

sensorMode.title: Sensor mode
sensorMode.tooltip: Select the sensor mode for the trackers. Mode 1 enables the magnetometer which is best if you have a stable geomagnetic environment (mag status is green or yellow). If unstable (mag status is red), use mode 2.

sensorCorrection.title: Sensor auto correction
sensorCorrection.tooltip: Enable or disable sensor auto correction features. Usually not needed to be changed and results vary between environments.

other.title: Other settings
other.tooltip: Some other settings that don't fit in the other categories, including language.

about.title: About
about.text: The SlimeTora project is a project that allows you to connect the HaritoraX trackers to the SlimeVR server.

debugging.title: Debugging
debugging.tooltip: An option with yellow text requires a restart of the program to fully apply.
debugging.text: Enable or disable debugging features for the program. Debugging tracker data will make log files huge, only use if requested or if you have tracker issues!

comPortsMissing.title: COM ports missing
comPortsMissing.message: Some COM ports set in the config were not found, please make sure your dongle(s) are connected.

noLogsFolder.title: No logs!
noLogsFolder.message: You should probably enable debug logging first in settings.

noConnectionMode.title: No connection mode enabled
noConnectionMode.message: Please enable at least one connection mode (Bluetooth or GX) in the settings.
